text: Total Dark Magic||This is the total amount of {{tr:icon_money}}Dark Magic available to your faction. Dark Magic can be generated via buildings, loot from winning battles, raiding and diplomacy.
The available {{tr:icon_treasury}}Dark Magic is displayed at the top of the screen on the campaign interface.

Dark Magic are unique - the life-force of the unliving, the more Dark Magic will be drawn to them. If the Winds of Dhar are shared between powerful Vampires and Necromancers, however, Dark Magic becomes more difficult to accumulate - their Undead legions requiring more energy to remain bound.
Use Warpstone[[img:nag_warpstone]][[/img]] to power Nagash's rituals.\\nGather Warpstone from marked mines[[img:nag_warpstone]][[/img]] around the world.
Perform Great Rituals to empower your legions with temporary benefits
Endless Tomb Grand spell take 5 turns to recharge. They are unlocked by Black Pyramid buildings. (When counter reaches 20 spell is recharged)
Apocalyptic Swarm Grand spell take 5 turns to recharge. They are unlocked by Black Pyramid buildings. (When counter reaches 20 spell is recharged)
Wrath of the Dead Grand spell take 10 turns to recharge. They are unlocked by Black Pyramid buildings. (When counter reaches 20 spell is recharged)
In order to research this technology, this amount of [[img:nag_warpstone]][[/img]]Warpstone will be deducted from your total.
